text: numbala mata tur kanda osava numbala apa pirinæmu dæ balavat lesa grahanaya kara ganu. tava da savan denu yæyi apa numbala gen pratigna gat sæti sihipat karanu. (evita) ovuhu apa savan di pitupævemu yæyi pævasuha. ovun ge pratiksepaya hetuven ovunge sit tula vasu pætava (næmadima pilibanda) va povanu læbiya. (nabivaraya) “numbala visvasavantayin nam numbala ge visvasa ya kavara karunak pilibanda numbala ta ana karanne da eya napuru viya” yæyi pavasanu
